name: Bart M. P. Jansen
content: Homepage of Bart M. P. Jansen Bart M. P. Jansen Personalia Publications Talks Awards Links Personalia Name: Prof. Bart M. P. Jansen E-mail: b.m.p.jansen [at] tue.nl Affiliation: Eindhoven University of Technology, The Netherlands (contact info) Research Group: Leader of the Graph Algorithms group, embedded in the Algorithms cluster Position: Associate Professor Interests: Wind surfing, snowboarding, salsa dancing, volleyball, obstacle runs, hiking, guitar, blues harmonica band Dirty Ground Hog Research Interests: Parameterized complexity, Kernelization, Graph theory PhD Students: Astrid Pieterse (04-11-2019), Huib Donkers (defended 14-09-2022), Jari de Kroon (defended 04-07-2023), Shivesh Kumar Roy (defended 19-09-2024), Ruben Verhaegh (ongoing), Faezeh Motiei (co-supervision ongoing), Jeroen Lamme (co-supervision ongoing) Former postdocs: Michał Włodarczyk, Benjamin Merlin Bumpus, Céline Swennenhuis Workshops: Organizer of SIGALGO.NL Symposium 2024, FPT Fest 2023, Shonan Meeting 144 Editorial Boards: Associate editor for ACM Transactions on Algorithms (TALG) Program Committees: ICALP 2025, STACS 2025, ESA 2024, LATIN 2024, IPEC 2023, SODA 2021, WG 2020, IPEC 2019 (co-chair), ICALP 2018, WG 2017, ESA 2016, IPEC 2016 Committees: Steering committee chair for PACE, board member for EYAE, board member for SIGALGO.NL ORCID: 0000-0001-8204-1268 Funding My research has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No 803421, ReduceSearch). html | css | © 2007 Anyone | Design by www.mitchinson.net This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License
